price: Àti pé tí kì í bá ṣe ìdẹ̀ra Olúwa mi ni, èmi náà ìbá wà nínú ẹni tí wọ́n máa mú wá sínú Iná.
arabic: وَلَوۡلَا نِعۡمَةُ رَبِّي لَكُنتُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُحۡضَرِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: walawlā niʿ'matu rabbī lakuntu mina al-muḥ'ḍarīna
